pages.text: The Forest of Gaia contains many plants not found in this plane, they often have odd effects that may be useful.

The Stunning Dahlia can be found within the Forest of Gaia.$(br)The plant is stubborn and can not be harvested by normal means.$(br)They have a certain affinity with Diamonds and they can be used to weaken the plant.$(br)When a living creature smells this plant, it seems to go into a daze.
The Lily of the Toxic can be found within the Forest of Gaia.$(br)The plant is poison to the touch, handle with care.
The Blazing Tulip can be found within the Forest of Gaia.$(br)This plant is very hot to the touch.$(br)Can be ground into a powder.
The Blood Rose can be found within the Forest of Gaia.$(br)Has so many deadly thorns, this plant is almost impossible to handle responsibly.

The Bloom of Death can be found within the Forest of Gaia.$(br)This flower is a lot harder to find than the other flowers in the Forest as is prefers dark areas.$(br)An overwhelming sense of dread falls upon anyone who dares hold it.
